ClipOutsideToPortal Struct Reference

This class adds a watcher named 'Render/clipOutsideToPortal' so the user can enable or disable the clipping of an outside chunk to a portal. More...

Detailed Description

This class adds a watcher named 'Render/clipOutsideToPortal' so the user can enable or disable the clipping of an outside chunk to a portal.
